sentences.sContent: In the Arab lexicon, the concept of justice means more than democracy.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the Arab lexicon, the concept of justice means more than democracy.
sentences.sCn: 在阿拉伯词典里，公正的概念比民主含义丰富的多。

sentences.sContent: Perhaps the least understood part of the voice application is the lexicon.
sentences.sContent_eng: Perhaps the least understood part of the voice application is the lexicon.
sentences.sCn: 或许语音应用程序中您理解得最少的部件是词典。

words.tran: 词汇的；[语] 词典的；词典编纂的
